extensionTitle.description: Name of the extension in the toolbar

saveButton.description: button from option.html in order to save data

erase.description: option html if erase button clicked

emptyChamp.message: Enter an Adress and an auth key please

instance.description: option.html button name wich open the instance adder option page

view.description: option.html button name wich open the view option page

idSaved.description: when you press 'save' button and option.html close -> save succes

NoCredentials.description: if there is no storage credentials

warning.description: notif title if there is a response error

warningMessage.message: It seems that an error has occurred
warningMessage.description: if a problem has occured on the server side

numberOfRes.description: number of returned event from fetch

event.description: name of res notif of fetch

nbOfElement.message: Number of Attributs in one event:
nbOfElement.description: number of Element in an object (response.attribut)

nbOfObject.message: Number of event in the request:
nbOfObject.description: number of object in the response

nbOfEvent.message: Number of object the Event attributes:
nbOfEvent.description: Number of object the Event attributes
